name: GetPendingTasksByOwner
description: Retrieves a list of the latest 15 pending tasks for a specific owner from Zoho Projects. A task is considered pending if its status is 'Open', 'In Progress', or 'To be Tested'. This action can handle partial owner names, such as just the first name.

ownerName.description: The full or partial name of the task owner (e.g., 'Anuj', 'John Doe').

name: GetProjectDetails
description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific project in Zoho Projects. Supports partial project name search. If multiple projects match, the agent must ask the user to clarify. Can be used to answer specific questions about a project field, and should also return a full summary.

projectName.description: Partial name of the project (e.g., 'PowerGrid', 'Titan'). Case-insensitive.

fields.description: Optional list of specific project fields to retrieve (e.g., ['status', 'issues']). If not provided, return the full summary.
